bibl.title: Greek and Latin Documents from 'Abu Sha'ar, 1992-1993.
bibl.note: A. Documents from 'Abu Sha'ar (fifth century or later): 1. Inv. AS93-15-33. Greek inscription on an amphora; - 2. Inv. AS-92-W. Visitor's inscription (with the occurrence of ﬁndikopleÊsthw); - 3. Christian inscription with eÂw yeÒw; - 4. Christian prayer (on stone); - 5. Fragment of a Christian inscription. - B. Ostraka from Bir 'Abu Sha'ar (early second century A.D.): 6. Inv. BAS93-15-21. Latin Letter; - 7-9. Inv. BAS93-15-12; BAS93-15-22+29; BAS93-15-6+11+4. Three Greek Letters addressed to Niger. <indikopleustes, heis theos>
